Text: apple medium service term and condition
these term and condition create contract between you and apple the agreement please read the agreement carefully to confirm your understanding and acceptance of the agreement click agree
introduction to our service

this agreement governs your use of apple service service through which you can buy get license rent or subscribe to content apps a defined below and other in app service collectively content content may be offered through the service by apple or third party our service are available for your use in your country or territory of residence home country by creating an account for use of the service in particular country or territory you are specifying it a your home country to use our service you need compatible hardware software latest version recommended and sometimes required and internet access fee may apply our service performance may be affected by these factor
using our service
payment tax and refund

you can acquire content on our service for free or for charge either of which is referred to a transaction each transaction is an electronic contract between you and apple and or you and the entity providing the content on our service however if you are customer of apple distribution international ltd apple distribution international ltd is the merchant of record for the content you acquire from certain service g apple book app store etc a displayed on the product page and or during the acquisition process for the relevant service in such case you acquire the content from apple distribution international ltd which is licensed by the content provider g app provider a defined below book publisher etc when you make your first transaction we will ask you to choose how frequently we should ask for your password for future transaction if you enable touch id for transaction we will ask you to authenticate all transaction with your fingerprint and if you enable face id for transaction we will ask you to authenticate all transaction using facial recognition manage your password setting at any time by following these instruction http support apple com ht204030 apple will charge your selected payment method such a your credit card debit card gift card code or other method available in your home country for any paid transaction including any applicable tax if you have also added it to your apple wallet apple may charge your selected payment method in apple wallet using apple pay if we cannot charge your selected payment method for any reason such a expiration or insufficient fund you remain responsible for any uncollected amount and we will attempt to charge the payment method again a you may update your payment method information if you pre order content you will be charged when the content is delivered to you unless you cancel prior to the content availability in accordance with local law apple may update information regarding your selected payment method if provided such information by your financial institution for detail about how transaction are billed please visit http support apple com ht5582 all transaction are final content price may change at any time if technical problem prevent or unreasonably delay delivery of content your exclusive and sole remedy is either replacement of the content or refund of the price paid a determined by apple from time to time apple may refuse refund request if we find evidence of fraud refund abuse or other manipulative behavior that entitles apple to corresponding counterclaim term related to store credit and gift card code are available here http www apple com legal internet service itunes giftcards
account

using our service and accessing your content may require an apple id an apple id is the account you use across apple ecosystem use of game center is subject to this agreement and also requires game center account your account is valuable and you are responsible for maintaining it confidentiality and security apple is not responsible for any loss arising from the unauthorized use of your account please contact apple if you suspect that your account ha been compromised

you must be age 13 or equivalent minimum age in your home country a set forth in the registration process to create an account and use our service apple id for person under this age can be created by parent or legal guardian using family sharing or by an approved educational institution
privacy
your use of our service is subject to apple privacy policy which is available at http www apple com legal privacy
service and content usage rule

your use of the service and content must follow the rule set forth in this section usage rule any other use of the service and content is material breach of this agreement apple may monitor your use of the service and content to ensure that you are following these usage rule
all service
you may use the service and content only for personal noncommercial purpose except a set forth in the app store content section below
apple delivery of service or content doe not transfer any commercial or promotional use right to you and doe not constitute grant or waiver of any right of the copyright owner
you can use content from up to five different apple id on each device

for any service you can have up to 10 device but only maximum of 5 computer signed in with your apple id at one time though simultaneous stream or downloads of content may be limited to lower number of device a set out below under apple music and apple tv content each computer must also be authorized using the same apple id to learn more about authorization of computer visit http support apple com ht201251 device can be associated with different apple id once every 90 day
manipulating play count downloads rating or review via any mean such a using bot script or automated process or ii providing or accepting any kind of compensation or incentive is prohibited
it is your responsibility not to lose destroy or damage content once downloaded we encourage you to back up your content regularly
you may not tamper with or circumvent any security technology included with the service
you may access our service only using apple software and may not modify or use modified version of such software
video content requires an hdcp connection
audio and video content sale and rental

you can use digital right management drm free content on reasonable number of compatible device that you own or control drm protected content can be used on up to five computer and any number of device that you sync to from those computer
content rental are viewable on single device at time and must be played within 30 day and completed within 48 hour of the start of play stopping pausing or restarting doe not extend this period
you may burn an audio playlist of purchased music to disc for listening purpose up to seven time this limitation doe not apply to drm free content other content may not be burned to disc
app store content

the term apps includes apps and app clip for any apple platform and or operating system including any in app purchase extension such a keyboard sticker and subscription made available in such apps or app clip

individual acting on behalf of commercial enterprise governmental organization or educational institution an enterprise may download and sync non arcade apps for use by either a single individual on one or more device owned or controlled by an enterprise or ii multiple individual on single shared device owned or controlled by an enterprise for the sake of clarity each device used serially or collectively by multiple user requires separate license
apple music
an individual apple music membership allows you to stream on single device at time family membership allows you or your family member to stream on up to six device at time
apple arcade
apple arcade apps may only be downloaded or redownloaded with valid apple arcade trial or subscription
if your subscription end apps downloaded via apple arcade will no longer be accessible to you
apple tv content
for most channel you can stream content on up to three device simultaneously
learn more about apple tv content usage rule at http support apple com ht210074
downloads

you may be limited in the amount of content you may download and some downloaded content may expire after given amount of time after downloaded or first played certain content may not be available for download at all

you may be able to redownload previously acquired content redownload to your device that are signed in with the same apple id associated device you can see content type available for redownload in your home country at http support apple com ht204632 content may not be available for redownload if that content is no longer offered on our service
subscription

the service and certain apps may allow you to purchase access to content or service on subscription basis paid subscription paid subscription automatically renew until cancelled in the manage subscription section of your account setting to learn more about cancelling your subscription visit http support apple com ht202039 we will notify you if the price of paid subscription increase and if required seek your consent to continue you will be charged no more than 24 hour prior to the start of the latest paid subscription period if we cannot charge your payment method for any reason such a expiration or insufficient fund and you have not cancelled the paid subscription you remain responsible for any uncollected amount and we will attempt to charge the payment method a you may update your payment method information this may result in change to the start of your next paid subscription period and may change the date on which you are billed for each period we reserve the right to cancel your paid subscription if we are unable to successfully charge your payment method to renew your subscription certain paid subscription may offer free trial prior to charging your payment method if you decide to unsubscribe from paid subscription before we start charging your payment method cancel the subscription at least 24 hour before the free trial end
if you start free trial to paid subscription offered by apple a content provider an apple paid subscription and cancel before it end you cannot reactivate the free trial

free trial or free offer to apple paid subscription excluding icloud cannot be combined with any free trial or offer of apple one if you are in free trial or free offer for any apple paid subscription and you subscribe to apple one your free trial or offer will not be paused even if you have access to such apple paid subscription through your apple one subscription you acknowledge that your free trial or free offer may expire while you are paid subscriber to apple one and apple shall have no obligation to reinstate reimburse or otherwise compensate you for any part of such expired free trial or free offer
when your paid subscription to any service end you will lose access to any functionality or content of that service that requires paid subscription
content and service availability

term found in this agreement that relate to service content type feature or functionality not available in your home country are not applicable to you unless and until they become available to you to see the content type available to you in your home country go to the service or visit http support apple com ht204411 certain service and content available to you in your home country may not be available to you when traveling outside of your home country
third party device and equipment

if you use our service on non apple branded device you may not be able to access all feature or content type term in this agreement relating to unavailable feature or content type are not applicable to you if you later choose to access our service from an apple branded device you agree that all term of this agreement will apply to your use on such device additionally certain service may require direct or suggest you use third party equipment in some circumstance and or for certain activity such use is subject to the term and condition of such equipment and should be made in accordance with the applicable manufacturer instruction
your submission to our service

our service may allow you to submit or post material such a comment rating and review picture video and podcasts including associated metadata and artwork your use of such feature must comply with the submission guideline below which may be updated from time to time if you see material that do not comply with the submission guideline please use the report concern feature you hereby grant apple worldwide royalty free perpetual nonexclusive license to use the material you submit within the service and related marketing and apple internal purpose apple may monitor and decide to remove or edit any submitted material
submission guideline you may not use the service to
post any material that you do not have permission right or license to use or ii infringe on the right of any third party
post objectionable offensive unlawful deceptive inaccurate or harmful content
post personal private or confidential information belonging to others
request personal information from minor
impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with another person or entity
post or transmit spam including but not limited to unsolicited or unauthorized advertising promotional material or informational announcement

post fake rating or review
plan or engage in any illegal fraudulent or manipulative activity
family sharing

the organizer of family organizer must be 18 year or older and the parent or legal guardian of any family member under age 13 or the equivalent minimum age in their home country a set forth in the registration process apple device are required for access to all of the family sharing feature

purchase sharing family sharing purchase sharing feature allows you to share eligible content among up to six member of family the organizer invite other member to participate and agrees to pay for all transaction initiated by family member the organizer payment method is used to pay for any transaction initiated by family member except when the family member account ha store credit which is always used first family member are acting a agent for the organizer when the organizer payment method is used the organizer hereby agrees 1 to pay for such transaction and 2 that transaction initiated by family member are authorized organizer are responsible for complying with their payment method contract and assume all risk related to sharing access to the payment method with family member receipt or invoice for any family member transaction is sent to the initiating family member and the organizer

ask to buy ask to buy is convenient feature that allows an organizer to approve transaction initiated by family member under age 18 or the equivalent age of majority in your home country the organizer must be the parent or legal guardian of any family member for whom ask to buy is activated content shared by family member or acquired via content code may not be subject to ask to buy

family member change when family member leaf or is removed from the family the remaining family member may no longer be able to access the former member content including content acquired with the organizer payment method

family sharing rule you can only belong to one family at time and may join any family no more than twice per year you can change the apple id you associate with family no more than once every 90 day all family member must share the same home country not all content including in app purchase subscription and some previously acquired apps are eligible for purchase sharing apple tv apple tv channel apple one family apple one premier apple music family apple arcade and apple news subscription are automatically enabled for family sharing subscription shared by family may be subject to content usage limitation on per subscription basis
personalized recommendation feature
the service may recommend content to you based on your downloads purchase and other activity you may opt out from receiving such personalized recommendation for some service in your account setting

some recommendation feature may require your permission before they are turned on if you turn on these feature you will be asked to give apple permission to collect and store certain data including but not limited to data about your device activity location and usage please carefully read the information presented when you turn on these feature
additional itunes store term
season pas and multi pas

pas allows you to purchase and receive television content a it becomes available season pas applies to television content that ha limited number of episode per season multi pas applies to television content that is available on an ongoing basis the full price of season pas or multi pas is charged at the time of the transaction season pas or multi pas content is available for download up to 90 day after the last episode becomes available if automatic renewal is selected when you obtain multi pas you will be charged the full price of each subsequent multi pas cycle you can turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hour prior to the beginning of the next multi pas cycle in your account setting if content provider delivers to apple fewer tv episode than planned when you purchased season pas we will credit to your apple id the retail value of the corresponding number of episode that were not provided to apple

apps may offer content service or functionality for use within such apps in app purchase in app purchase that are consumed during the use of the app for example virtual gem cannot be transferred among device and can be downloaded only once you must authenticate your account before making in app purchase separate from any authentication to obtain other content by entering your password or using touch id or face id you will be able to make additional in app purchase for fifteen minute without re authenticating unless you ve asked u to require password for every purchase or have enabled touch id or face id you can turn off the ability to make in app purchase by following these instruction http support apple com ht201304

additional apple music term

icloud music library is an apple music feature that allows you to access your matched or uploaded song playlist and music video acquired from apple music the itunes store or another source icloud music library content on your apple music enabled device icloud music library is turned on automatically when you set up your apple music membership icloud music library collect information about your icloud music library content this information is associated with your apple id and compared to icloud music library content currently available on apple music icloud music library content that is not matched is uploaded to apple icloud music library server in format determined by apple you can upload up to 100 000 song song acquired from the itunes store or apple music do not count against this limit song that do not meet certain criterion for example excessively large file or that are not authorized for your device are not eligible for icloud music library when you use icloud music library apple log information such a the track you play stop or skip the device you use and the time and duration of playback you agree to use icloud music library only for lawfully acquired content icloud music library is provided on an a is basis and could contain error or inaccuracy you should back up your data and information prior to using icloud music library if you are not an apple music member you may purchase an itunes match subscription which is subject to the term set forth in this section when your apple music membership end you will lose access to to your icloud music library including icloud music library content that is uploaded to icloud music library server
